content.text:
This Zone property specifies if a Zone is intended to be enforced through packet-by-packet network level
restrictions. The format of this Zone property is shown in Figure 753.

tables.title: Table_8_3_2_3_5_2_Fabric_Enforced_Zone_Property
tables.table_md:
| Bytes | Description | |:---|:---| | 00 | **Zone Property Type (ZPTYPE):** This field specifies the Zone property type and shall be set to 1h. | | 02:01 | **Zone Property Length (ZPLEN):** This field specifies the length in bytes of this Zone property type and shall be set to 4h. | | 03 | **Zone Property Value (ZPVAL):** This field specifies the value of this Zone property. This field shall be set to the following value:
â€¢ 1h: Network level enforcement requested.
All other values are ignored. |
